00041 #include "DomainVisitor.hh"
00042 
00043 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00044 namespace bpt=boost::property_tree;
00045 
00046 // modifiers 
00047 
00048 void BasicInterval::completeParsing(bpt::ptree::value_type &node) {
00049   boost::optional< std::string >
00050     lo = TREX::utils::parse_attr< boost::optional<std::string> >(node.second, "min"),
00051     hi = TREX::utils::parse_attr< boost::optional<std::string> >(node.second, "max");
00052 
00053   if( lo ) 
00054     parseLower(*lo);
00055   if( hi )
00056     parseUpper(*hi);
00057 }
00058 
00059 // observers 
00060     
00061 std::string BasicInterval::getStringLower() const {
00062   std::ostringstream oss;
00063   print_lower(oss);
00064   return oss.str();
00065 }
00066 
00067 std::string BasicInterval::getStringUpper() const {
00068   std::ostringstream oss;
00069   print_upper(oss);
00070   return oss.str();
00071 }
00072 
00073 std::ostream &BasicInterval::print_domain(std::ostream &out) const {
00074   if( isSingleton() ) 
00075     return print_lower(out);
00076   else
00077     return print_upper(print_lower(out<<'[')<<", ")<<']';
00078 }
00079 
00080 std::ostream &BasicInterval::toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const {
00081   std::fill_n(std::ostream_iterator<char>(out), tabs, ' ');
00082   out<<'<'<<getTypeName();
00083   if( hasLower() )
00084     print_lower(out<<" min=\"")<<'\"';
00085   if( hasUpper() )
00086     print_upper(out<<" max=\"")<<'\"';
00087   return out<<"/>";
00088 }

00090 // manipulators
00091 
00092 void BasicInterval::accept(DomainVisitor &visitor) const {
00093   return visitor.visit(this);
00094 }
